channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 Update Services for SAP Solutions
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 Update Services for SAP Solutions

item.title: CVE-2023-3812|2024-05-23T22:48:09.561Z -- Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 Update Services for SAP Solutions
item.description: An out-of-bounds memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernel’s TUN/TAP device driver functionality in how a user generates a malicious (too big) networking packet when napi frags is enabled. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-3812|2024-05-23T22:48:09.561Z -- Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 Update Services for SAP Solutions
item.description: An out-of-bounds memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernel’s TUN/TAP device driver functionality in how a user generates a malicious (too big) networking packet when napi frags is enabled. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.
